name: Your X has applied for a final order as a sole applicant
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) has applied for a final order as a sole applicant. They had to apply on their own because you did not confirm the application. You were given 2 weeks notice of this.  

The application for a final order will be reviewed and if granted, then your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)) will be legally ended. You will receive another email within 2 working days telling you whether the application has been granted. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Important update: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
